context.name: Gary Coleman
context.about: Became a star of the hit sitcom Different Strokes in 1978 at age 10 playing the character Arnold Jackson. Coleman's common exclamation on the show, "What'choo talkin' 'bout, Willis?", quickly became a pop culture catch-phrase.
